content.question: In the fourth paragraph, Matilda, as the narrator, makes the remark that “A new silence was about to open up between us,” which exposes the origin of a distance between mother and daughter caused by

choices.label: her mother’s apology for Matilda’s father’s behavior
her mother’s condemnation of Matilda’s father
Matilda’s intention to aggravate her mother
Matilda’s resentment at being denied the truth

content.answer: her mother’s apology for Matilda’s father’s behavior

skill.text: Skill 4.B: Identify and explain the function of point of view in a narrative.
